Title: .NET Framework December 2019 Security and Quality Rollup | .NET Blog
Description:
Today, we are releasing the December 2019 Security and Quality Rollup Updates for .NET Framework.
Security
No new security fixes. See September 2019 Security and Quality Rollup for the latest security updates.
Quality and Reliability
This release contains the following quality and reliability improvements.

Title: SHA-1 is a Shambles
Description: We have computed the very first chosen-prefix collision for SHA-1. In a nutshell, this means a complete and practical break of the SHA-1 hash function, with dangerous practical implications if you are still using this hash function.  To put it in another way: all attacks that are practical on MD5 are now also practical on SHA-1.

Title: Alienware turned a gaming PC into a Nintendo Switch
Description:
Alienware builds desktops and laptops, and at CES 2020, the company showed off its vision for the future of portable gaming, the Concept UFO prototype. It looks a whole lot like a Nintendo Switch, except that its a full Windows 10 gaming PC that can play nearly any major PC game, anywhere. 

Learn more: http://bit.ly/2N090og
